text: 8:3-5 Onger Akaba 83:11Guizbangɨra, God Midianian mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir pumuning isa ian agharim gatɨ, aningɨn ziamning Orep ko Sep. Ezɨ ia aningɨn fɨrimning atu. Bizir kam bar ekefe. Kɨ kamaghɨn garir bizitam gamizir puvatɨ.” Gideon kamaghɨn mɨkemegha gɨvazɨ, Efraimɨn anabamɨn adarazi uam an atari puvatɨ.
